/usr/bin/c++    -Wall   -O3 -march=native -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/draw_traj.dir/draw_trajectory.cpp.o  -o draw_traj -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW -lwayland-client -lwayland-egl -lwayland-cursor -lEGL -lxkbcommon -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lpthread -lOpenNI -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -llz4 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
